content.text: I'm doing pretty well, thanks! Just got back from a walk with my dog, Petrucci.
Oh nice! I love dogs. What kind of dog is he?
He's a goldendoodle. He's the best dog in the world.
I've heard really good things about goldendoodles. They're supposed to be really friendly and smart.
They definitely are! Petrucci is a big goofball, but he's also very smart and obedient.
That's great! I've always wanted a dog, but I'm not sure I have the time for one right now.
Yeah, they definitely take a lot of time and energy. But they're so worth it!
I'm sure they are! Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a great day!
